description:
üêçüêç Pycon Colombia 2023 in this edition brings guests from another dimension, This year, we will have the participation of CPython Developer in Residence, Python 3.8 and 3.9 release manager. Gradual typing enthusiast, asynchronous programming proponent, and creator of the auto-formatter Black. ambv on Github.

Likes immersive single-player role-playing games, Scotch whisky, and road cycling. In his free time, he produces electronic music, which includes software and hardware of his own making.

title: Keynote PyCon Colombia 2023
